MIL3D LABELS

Paper Submission is Now Open

Papers are now being accepted on the CMT platform

Published: May 4, 2021 by The DALI Organizers

You may now submit your paper to the DALI workshop on Microsoft CMT at https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/DALI2021! Submissions will be accepted until June 25, 2021 at 11:59 PDT.
